Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, bone marrow aspirate, lymph node or other tissue fine-needle aspirate
Purpose: To evaluate cell surface markers for the diagnosis and classification of leukemia and lymphoma using flow cytometry.
Container: K2/K3 EDTA tube (blood), heparinized tube (bone marrow aspirate), sterile container with RPMI medium (FNA tissue)
Equipment: Flow cytometer equipped with appropriate lasers and detectors
